resources.string: Located in eastern Antioquia, it is perhaps the most iconographic municipality in the region. His great stone is the main tourist attraction in town, from there you can enjoy a 360 degrees the lush beauty of the Guatape dam and its neighboring lands, Sockets taxed on the facades of residences and other buildings representing traditions, when the water level low reweighed, you can get to see the dome of the Church of the old Peñol, not counting the stunning scenery and the warmth of its people.
La Playita is the place to enjoy the scenery of Guatape, an excellent bar and grill in the day and at night !!!
It is a resto-bar created for football fans, where they can find great variety of beers and combine them with some delicious chicken wings
Restaurant Bar are a typical food where you all find the different foods that characterize our country
According to figures provided by DANE 2005 census, the Ethnographic composition of the municipality is:

It covers an area of 2,262 hectares and 1,200 million cubic meters, has several marinas and docks where boats are rented and tours are given on tourist boats and marine bike, where you can practice water sports such as kayaking, sailing, water skiing.
It is located 4 km from Guatape, via Peñol, monolith 200 meters high where a 360 degree view is obtained on the Guatape dam impressive.

Where is the church of Our Lady of Carmen Baroque architecture, lined and structured on the roofs of its interior by great bastions and wooden beams making it unique in Antioquia, a large water fountain erected in the square contribute to a greater charm of this park.
Located one block from the main square 1 kmt extension where you can enjoy the most varied cuisine in 25 restaurants found there, with a privileged view over the Guatape dam
It is located on the boardwalk of the Guatape dam is said to be the longest of Antioquia and Colombia for having 600 meters away that goes over the waters of the dam.
Located on the lake Guatapé, it is a magical place surrounded by forests, where you will feel the total connection with nature in a safe and quiet very private atmosphere ...
Located just 2 km from the entrance to the stone Penol, Hotel Los Recuerdos is the largest and most complete hotel Guatape, enjoys all s services to guarantee you a time of unforgettable rest

Hotel Isala Guaca is a Paradise near the city of Medellin; pantries located in the sidewalk in front of the dam "El Penol Guatapé". An ideal place for rest, relaxation, where you will find peace and tranquility that has desired
Services: We offer water sports such as fishing boat, kayak, water bike, jetsky, Nautico and sky tour of the reservoir.

Services: Boat transfer to Guatape Hotel and return, Ecological Trekking, Tour in Planchon (Sundays and holidays), evening bonfire on the beach, paddle boats, fishing, beach volleyball court and a game room Pool and Billiards
Services: Wetland: heated pool, Turkish and Jacuzzi,. Restaurant, nightclub. Attractions: Fishing, Motor Worm, Bicycle Nautica, Skiing, Majestic yacht ljo
